    AxisContainerEx, Colorbar, ComponentEx, Element, ElementEx, PComponent

extends Colorbar, AxisContainerEx

      • getAxisTransform

        @Nonnull
AxisTransformEx getAxisTransform()
        Description copied from interface: Colorbar
        Return the AxisTransform of this colorbar. The returned AxisTransform is NUMBER-LINEAR, and cannot be changed. The range of returned AxisTransform will be auto-update when the limits of mapping changed.
        Specified by:
        getAxisTransform in interface Colorbar
        Returns:
        the AxisTransform of this colorbar

      • linkImageMapping

        void linkImageMapping(ImageMappingEx imageMapping)

      • getShortId

        java.lang.String getShortId()
        Returns the short id of this element. The short id is composed of series of ids concatenated with dots. The 1st id is the id of this element, the 2nd id is the id of the parent of this element, etc, until but not include the root plot.
        Returns:
        the short id of this component.

      • directLocation

        void directLocation(double locX,
                  double locY)
        Sets the location by layout director. The origin point of colorbar is bottom-left corner of the bar.
        Parameters:
        locX - the x value of the location
        locY - the y value of the location

      • setLength

        void setLength(double length)
        Set the length of this colorbar.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of this colorbar

      • getAsc

        double getAsc()

      • getDesc

        double getDesc()

      • getThickness

        double getThickness()
        Returns the thickness of this colorbar. When position is top or bottom, thickness is its height. When position is left or right, thickness is its width.
        Returns:
        the thickness of this colorbar

      • calcThickness

        void calcThickness()
        Calculate thickness of this colorbar. This method is always called by plot when committing changes.
